author: pgoldstein
msg: Refactoring of code to make it more "Avalon"-ish
Added cleanup so the fetch tasks are properly removed from the TimeScheduler

author: danny
msg: config changes needed to support fetchpop block
and "enabled" attribute in other top level blocks

author: danny
msg: A new block providing fetchpop functionality using commons-net POP3 library
Fetch inserts fetched mail into the spoolmanager spool

author: danny
msg: Added an enabled="true|false" attribute to block conf for these blocks to easily turn listening on and off without having to fully remove the block.
